name: Hungry Frog Lite
description:
Hungry Frog is the most the enjoyable iOS game for you and your family. Kids just love it! Parents enjoy it! The game takes you deep into a colourful cartoon world of the "Hungry Frog". Quality animations and rich graphics will quickly make you feel part of this wonderful world.

Very intuitive game-play. It's so easy learn how to play. Kids pick it up right away. But the more challenging game modes will provide enough thrill for those who are look for that.

Relaxing and joyful music combined with tranquil nature sounds add real magic to your experience.

What What What? Are you still reading? What is holding you? Feed Hungry Frog with some juicy mosquitos right now!!
